archimate:BusinessObject.name: Verification criteria
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: The verification criteria (the measures to be assessed), who will perform verification activities, and the verification environments of the system of interest

properties.value: Laut INCOSE Handbuch 4.0 - übersetzt von GfSE: "Die Verifikationskriterien (zu untersuchende Kennzahlen) umfassen Verifikationsaktivitäten und auch das Verifikationsumfeld des Zielsystems".
The verification criteria (the measures to be assessed), who will perform verification activities, and the verification environments of the system of interest
